copyItem.description: Copy a file or folder to a new location in dropbox

isDeleted.description: Whether the item has been deleted.

isShared.description: Whether the item is shared with other users.

modifiedAt.description: The date and time the file was last modified, formatted as an ISO 8601 timestamp.

name.description: The name of the item, including extension.

path.description: The path to the item in the user's Dropbox.

symlinkTarget.description: The target of the symlink, if the file is a symlink

webUrl.description: The URL to view the item on the Dropbox website.

nextToken.description: The token to get the next page of items. Leave empty to get the first page.
